message: anyone with experience of displaying 360 photos in web apps, my app is built with angular2, n i'll probably need to build a custom component for that, so, right now, i'm just looking for the best library someone used before to display 360 photos in a web app n it didn't downgrade the overall performance of the page, i also need something lightweight..
